name: places/ChIJR40rAYxZwokR0oicymyGjKc
formattedAddress: 7 Cleveland Pl, New York, NY 10012, USA
adrFormatAddress: 7 Cleveland Pl, New York, NY 10012, USA

originalText.text: Matthew has magic hands! I’ve gone to a number of stylists in NYC looking to get my dark brown hair blonde - and sadly they failed so many times. Matthew not only made it happen, but did so while maintaining the integrity of my hair. It’s healthier than its ever been and he continues to lighten it with each appointment. I’m really crazy about my hair and Matthew has been extremely patient with me. He explains his process and is always spot on. I’ve recommended several girlfriends to him as well and each of them are forever grateful!

originalText.text: Matthew is a genius!  I actually started going to him for a mens cut after a few of my girlfriends recommended him based off of their cut & colors.  The salon is great and comfortable but Matthew is really the star here - he’s so personable and professional he makes the whole experience painless and fun!  Highly recommend!

text.text: Matthew is a genius!  I actually started going to him for a mens cut after a few of my girlfriends recommended him based off of their cut & colors.  The salon is great and comfortable but Matthew is really the star here - he’s so personable and professional he makes the whole experience painless and fun!  Highly recommend!

originalText.text: Matthew is the hair whisperer. When Matthew came to NY he rescued my hair. At the time my hair was frizzy and dry and the color was off. My skin tone didn't even look right. He truly helped my hair come back to life. The cut is subtle and perfect, he is a color master, and gives the best advise about how to bring your hair back to health. As I age, color is so important to me. It makes all the difference with how my skin looks and how I feel. His color is really perfection. I can honestly say I have never been disappointed.   - 7 years later and I won't got to anyone else. !!!

originalText.text: I started going to Matthew to let my curly hair grow out after having it buzzed for many years. A tough task, but he got me through it. He’s the recommendation for anyone who ever asks me for someone who’s great at hair!
